Timer_Delay_Duration.title: Delay Duration
Timer_Delay_Duration.description: The duration of the time delay.

Timer_Remaining_Time.title: Remaining Time
Timer_Remaining_Time.description: The time remaining in an operation.

Timer_Minimum_Off-time.title: Minimum Off-time
Timer_Minimum_Off-time.description: The duration of the rearm delay (i.e. the delay from the end of one cycle until the beginning of the next, the inhibit time).

Timer_On_Off.title: On/Off
Timer_On_Off.description: On/off control. Boolean value where True is On and False is Off.

Timer_Digital_Input_Counter.title: Digital Input Counter
Timer_Digital_Input_Counter.description: The cumulative value of active state detected.

Timer_Cumulative_Time.title: Cumulative Time
Timer_Cumulative_Time.description: The total time in seconds that the timer input is true. Writing a 0 resets the time.

Timer_Digital_State.title: Digital State
Timer_Digital_State.description: The current state of the timer output.

Timer_Counter.title: Counter
Timer_Counter.description: Counts the number of times the timer output transitions from 0 to 1.

Timer_Timer_Mode.title: Timer Mode
Timer_Timer_Mode.description: Type of timer pattern used by the timer. 1: One-shot, 2: On-Time or Interval, 3: Time delay on pick-up, 4: Time Delay on Drop-Out, 0: disables the timer.

Timer_Application_Type.title: Application Type
Timer_Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
